PHILSCONSOLEDOCTOR.Settings.AIUrlHint: The URL of the AI service to use for analysis.
PHILSCONSOLEDOCTOR.Settings.MaxLogsHint: Maximum number of logs to keep in history.
PHILSCONSOLEDOCTOR.UI.NoMetrics:
No data recorded.
Click 'Start Recording', perform actions, then 'Stop'.
PHILSCONSOLEDOCTOR.UI.ExplicitIncompatib: These modules have declared themselves incompatible via console errors. Disable one of them immediately.
PHILSCONSOLEDOCTOR.UI.BlockedActionsDesc: These modules explicitly returned 'false' to stop an action. If something isn't working, check here first.
PHILSCONSOLEDOCTOR.UI.HookInspectorDesc: Modules listening to critical hooks. Entries in ORANGE have multiple listeners (Potential Conflict).
PHILSCONSOLEDOCTOR.UI.DescUI: Modules modifying the same UI elements.
PHILSCONSOLEDOCTOR.UI.AdviceUI: Advice: Both modules are trying to change this element. This often causes visual glitches. Try disabling one.
PHILSCONSOLEDOCTOR.UI.DescEnv: Modules fighting over Lighting, Weather or Sight.
PHILSCONSOLEDOCTOR.UI.AdviceEnv: Advice: Multiple modules controlling environment can cause flicker. Ensure only one weather module is active.
